name: Asteroid Deflector XL
description: Prevent asteroids from hitting a planet by changing their course with various projectiles against the gravity of a planet and a star. Manage your economics like money, weapon research and planet population.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Celeron Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any
